submapp.som.Som.data_stdev¶

property Som.data_stdev¶

Standard deviation of the training data

Usually all data are standardized (especially when different types of data are used in the same vector). In order to standardized, destandardized, compute errors effectively the initial (i.e. of the training data) mean and standard deviation is stored. Here is the standard deviation of the training data.

See also

data_mean for the mean

Return type

np.ndarray, shape =(1, ) or (p, )
